title: plz rito fix the fucking ranked game
body: u guys should improve matchmaking system, at least for those in promotion. how the fuq 1/3 games. there are trolls, abusive players, ppl try to take position which are already taken. its fucking ridiculous. plz do smth about it. it is the most important matter

replies.body: It's about your KDA ratio. If you have a bad KDA you get less lp ... and so the cycle continues.

YOUR FUCKING SKILL SHOT HIT BOXS IS FUCKING DUMB YOU RETARED COMPANY I SPEND MONEY ON THIS FUCKING HELL OF A GAME AND IM GETTING FUCKING FED UP WITH THIS SHIT FIX IT YOU FUCKING CUNTS AT RITO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Deal with it 8)
its a normal thing
